40#define CIK_PIPE_PER_MEC (4)

42static const uint32_t watchRegs[MAX_WATCH_ADDRESSES * ADDRESS_WATCH_REG_MAX] = {
43 TCP_WATCH0_ADDR_H, TCP_WATCH0_ADDR_L, TCP_WATCH0_CNTL,
44 TCP_WATCH1_ADDR_H, TCP_WATCH1_ADDR_L, TCP_WATCH1_CNTL,
45 TCP_WATCH2_ADDR_H, TCP_WATCH2_ADDR_L, TCP_WATCH2_CNTL,
46 TCP_WATCH3_ADDR_H, TCP_WATCH3_ADDR_L, TCP_WATCH3_CNTL
47};
48
49struct kgd_mem {
50 struct radeon_bo *bo;
51 uint64_t gpu_addr;
52 void *cpu_ptr;
53};

112static const struct kfd2kgd_calls kfd2kgd = {
113 .init_gtt_mem_allocation = alloc_gtt_mem,
114 .free_gtt_mem = free_gtt_mem,
115 .get_vmem_size = get_vmem_size,
116 .get_gpu_clock_counter = get_gpu_clock_counter,
117 .get_max_engine_clock_in_mhz = get_max_engine_clock_in_mhz,
118 .program_sh_mem_settings = kgd_program_sh_mem_settings,
119 .set_pasid_vmid_mapping = kgd_set_pasid_vmid_mapping,
120 .init_pipeline = kgd_init_pipeline,
121 .init_interrupts = kgd_init_interrupts,
122 .hqd_load = kgd_hqd_load,
123 .hqd_sdma_load = kgd_hqd_sdma_load,
124 .hqd_is_occupied = kgd_hqd_is_occupied,
125 .hqd_sdma_is_occupied = kgd_hqd_sdma_is_occupied,
126 .hqd_destroy = kgd_hqd_destroy,
127 .hqd_sdma_destroy = kgd_hqd_sdma_destroy,
128 .address_watch_disable = kgd_address_watch_disable,
129 .address_watch_execute = kgd_address_watch_execute,
130 .wave_control_execute = kgd_wave_control_execute,
131 .address_watch_get_offset = kgd_address_watch_get_offset,
132 .get_atc_vmid_pasid_mapping_pasid = get_atc_vmid_pasid_mapping_pasid,
133 .get_atc_vmid_pasid_mapping_valid = get_atc_vmid_pasid_mapping_valid,
134 .write_vmid_invalidate_request = write_vmid_invalidate_request,
135 .get_fw_version = get_fw_version
136};
137
138static const struct kgd2kfd_calls *kgd2kfd;
139
140bool radeon_kfd_init(void)
141{
142#if defined(CONFIG_HSA_AMD_MODULE)
143 bool (*kgd2kfd_init_p)(unsigned, const struct kgd2kfd_calls**);
144
145 kgd2kfd_init_p = symbol_request(kgd2kfd_init);
146
147 if (kgd2kfd_init_p == NULL)
148 return false;
149
150 if (!kgd2kfd_init_p(KFD_INTERFACE_VERSION, &kgd2kfd)) {
151 symbol_put(kgd2kfd_init);
152 kgd2kfd = NULL;
153
154 return false;
155 }
156
157 return true;
158#elif defined(CONFIG_HSA_AMD)
159 if (!kgd2kfd_init(KFD_INTERFACE_VERSION, &kgd2kfd)) {
160 kgd2kfd = NULL;
161
162 return false;
163 }
164
165 return true;
166#else
167 return false;
168#endif
169}
170
171void radeon_kfd_fini(void)
172{
173 if (kgd2kfd) {
174 kgd2kfd->exit();
175#ifdef CONFIG_HSA_AMD_MODULE
176 symbol_put(kgd2kfd_init);
177#endif
178 }
179}
180
181void radeon_kfd_device_probe(struct radeon_device *rdev)
182{
183 if (kgd2kfd)
184 rdev->kfd = kgd2kfd->probe((struct kgd_dev *)rdev,
185 rdev->pdev, &kfd2kgd);
186}
187
188void radeon_kfd_device_init(struct radeon_device *rdev)
189{
190 if (rdev->kfd) {
191 struct kgd2kfd_shared_resources gpu_resources = {
192 .compute_vmid_bitmap = 0xFF00,
193
194 .first_compute_pipe = 1,
195 .compute_pipe_count = 4 - 1,
196 };
197
198 radeon_doorbell_get_kfd_info(rdev,
199 &gpu_resources.doorbell_physical_address,
200 &gpu_resources.doorbell_aperture_size,
201 &gpu_resources.doorbell_start_offset);
202
203 kgd2kfd->device_init(rdev->kfd, &gpu_resources);
204 }
205}
206
207void radeon_kfd_device_fini(struct radeon_device *rdev)
208{
209 if (rdev->kfd) {
210 kgd2kfd->device_exit(rdev->kfd);
211 rdev->kfd = NULL;
212 }
213}
214
215void radeon_kfd_interrupt(struct radeon_device *rdev, const void *ih_ring_entry)
216{
217 if (rdev->kfd)
218 kgd2kfd->interrupt(rdev->kfd, ih_ring_entry);
219}
220
221void radeon_kfd_suspend(struct radeon_device *rdev)
222{
223 if (rdev->kfd)
224 kgd2kfd->suspend(rdev->kfd);
225}
226
227int radeon_kfd_resume(struct radeon_device *rdev)
228{
229 int r = 0;
230
231 if (rdev->kfd)
232 r = kgd2kfd->resume(rdev->kfd);
233
234 return r;
235}
236
237static int alloc_gtt_mem(struct kgd_dev *kgd, size_t size,
238 void **mem_obj, uint64_t *gpu_addr,
239 void **cpu_ptr)
240{
241 struct radeon_device *rdev = (struct radeon_device *)kgd;
242 struct kgd_mem **mem = (struct kgd_mem **) mem_obj;
243 int r;
244
245 BUG_ON(kgd == NULL);
246 BUG_ON(gpu_addr == NULL);
247 BUG_ON(cpu_ptr == NULL);
248
249 *mem = kmalloc(sizeof(struct kgd_mem), GFP_KERNEL);
250 if ((*mem) == NULL)
251 return -ENOMEM;
252
253 r = radeon_bo_create(rdev, size, PAGE_SIZE, true, RADEON_GEM_DOMAIN_GTT,
254 RADEON_GEM_GTT_WC, NULL, NULL, &(*mem)->bo);
255 if (r) {
256 dev_err(rdev->dev,
257 "failed to allocate BO for amdkfd (%d)\n", r);
258 return r;
259 }
260
261 /* map the buffer */
262 r = radeon_bo_reserve((*mem)->bo, true);
263 if (r) {
264 dev_err(rdev->dev, "(%d) failed to reserve bo for amdkfd\n", r);
265 goto allocate_mem_reserve_bo_failed;
266 }
267
268 r = radeon_bo_pin((*mem)->bo, RADEON_GEM_DOMAIN_GTT,
269 &(*mem)->gpu_addr);
270 if (r) {
271 dev_err(rdev->dev, "(%d) failed to pin bo for amdkfd\n", r);
272 goto allocate_mem_pin_bo_failed;
273 }
274 *gpu_addr = (*mem)->gpu_addr;
275
276 r = radeon_bo_kmap((*mem)->bo, &(*mem)->cpu_ptr);
277 if (r) {
278 dev_err(rdev->dev,
279 "(%d) failed to map bo to kernel for amdkfd\n", r);
280 goto allocate_mem_kmap_bo_failed;
281 }
282 *cpu_ptr = (*mem)->cpu_ptr;
283
284 radeon_bo_unreserve((*mem)->bo);
285
286 return 0;
287
288allocate_mem_kmap_bo_failed:
289 radeon_bo_unpin((*mem)->bo);
290allocate_mem_pin_bo_failed:
291 radeon_bo_unreserve((*mem)->bo);
292allocate_mem_reserve_bo_failed:
293 radeon_bo_unref(&(*mem)->bo);
294
295 return r;
296}
297
298static void free_gtt_mem(struct kgd_dev *kgd, void *mem_obj)
299{
300 struct kgd_mem *mem = (struct kgd_mem *) mem_obj;
301
302 BUG_ON(mem == NULL);
303
304 radeon_bo_reserve(mem->bo, true);
305 radeon_bo_kunmap(mem->bo);
306 radeon_bo_unpin(mem->bo);
307 radeon_bo_unreserve(mem->bo);
308 radeon_bo_unref(&(mem->bo));
309 kfree(mem);
310}
311
312static uint64_t get_vmem_size(struct kgd_dev *kgd)
313{
314 struct radeon_device *rdev = (struct radeon_device *)kgd;
315
316 BUG_ON(kgd == NULL);
317
318 return rdev->mc.real_vram_size;
319}
320
321static uint64_t get_gpu_clock_counter(struct kgd_dev *kgd)
322{
323 struct radeon_device *rdev = (struct radeon_device *)kgd;
324
325 return rdev->asic->get_gpu_clock_counter(rdev);
326}
327
328static uint32_t get_max_engine_clock_in_mhz(struct kgd_dev *kgd)
329{
330 struct radeon_device *rdev = (struct radeon_device *)kgd;
331
332 /* The sclk is in quantas of 10kHz */
333 return rdev->pm.dpm.dyn_state.max_clock_voltage_on_ac.sclk / 100;
334}
335
336static inline struct radeon_device *get_radeon_device(struct kgd_dev *kgd)
337{
338 return (struct radeon_device *)kgd;
339}
340
341static void write_register(struct kgd_dev *kgd, uint32_t offset, uint32_t value)
342{
343 struct radeon_device *rdev = get_radeon_device(kgd);
344
345#ifdef __NetBSD__
346 bus_space_write_4(rdev->rmmio_bst, rdev->rmmio_bsh, offset, value);
347#else
348 writel(value, (void __iomem *)(rdev->rmmio + offset));
349#endif
350}
351
352static uint32_t read_register(struct kgd_dev *kgd, uint32_t offset)
353{
354 struct radeon_device *rdev = get_radeon_device(kgd);
355
356#ifdef __NetBSD__
357 return bus_space_read_4(rdev->rmmio_bst, rdev->rmmio_bsh, offset);
358#else
359 return readl((void __iomem *)(rdev->rmmio + offset));
360#endif
361}
362
363static void lock_srbm(struct kgd_dev *kgd, uint32_t mec, uint32_t pipe,
364 uint32_t queue, uint32_t vmid)
365{
366 struct radeon_device *rdev = get_radeon_device(kgd);
367 uint32_t value = PIPEID(pipe) | MEID(mec) | VMID(vmid) | QUEUEID(queue);
368
369 mutex_lock(&rdev->srbm_mutex);
370 write_register(kgd, SRBM_GFX_CNTL, value);
371}
372
373static void unlock_srbm(struct kgd_dev *kgd)
374{
375 struct radeon_device *rdev = get_radeon_device(kgd);
376
377 write_register(kgd, SRBM_GFX_CNTL, 0);
378 mutex_unlock(&rdev->srbm_mutex);
379}
380
381static void acquire_queue(struct kgd_dev *kgd, uint32_t pipe_id,
382 uint32_t queue_id)
383{
384 uint32_t mec = (++pipe_id / CIK_PIPE_PER_MEC) + 1;
385 uint32_t pipe = (pipe_id % CIK_PIPE_PER_MEC);
386
387 lock_srbm(kgd, mec, pipe, queue_id, 0);
388}
389
390static void release_queue(struct kgd_dev *kgd)
391{
392 unlock_srbm(kgd);
393}
394
395static void kgd_program_sh_mem_settings(struct kgd_dev *kgd, uint32_t vmid,
396 uint32_t sh_mem_config,
397 uint32_t sh_mem_ape1_base,
398 uint32_t sh_mem_ape1_limit,
399 uint32_t sh_mem_bases)
400{
401 lock_srbm(kgd, 0, 0, 0, vmid);
402
403 write_register(kgd, SH_MEM_CONFIG, sh_mem_config);
404 write_register(kgd, SH_MEM_APE1_BASE, sh_mem_ape1_base);
405 write_register(kgd, SH_MEM_APE1_LIMIT, sh_mem_ape1_limit);
406 write_register(kgd, SH_MEM_BASES, sh_mem_bases);
407
408 unlock_srbm(kgd);
409}
410
411static int kgd_set_pasid_vmid_mapping(struct kgd_dev *kgd, unsigned int pasid,
412 unsigned int vmid)
413{
414 /*
415 * We have to assume that there is no outstanding mapping.
416 * The ATC_VMID_PASID_MAPPING_UPDATE_STATUS bit could be 0
417 * because a mapping is in progress or because a mapping finished and
418 * the SW cleared it.
419 * So the protocol is to always wait & clear.
420 */
421 uint32_t pasid_mapping = (pasid == 0) ? 0 : (uint32_t)pasid |
422 ATC_VMID_PASID_MAPPING_VALID_MASK;
423
424 write_register(kgd, ATC_VMID0_PASID_MAPPING + vmid*sizeof(uint32_t),
425 pasid_mapping);
426
427 while (!(read_register(kgd, ATC_VMID_PASID_MAPPING_UPDATE_STATUS) &
428 (1U << vmid)))
429 cpu_relax();
430 write_register(kgd, ATC_VMID_PASID_MAPPING_UPDATE_STATUS, 1U << vmid);
431
432 /* Mapping vmid to pasid also for IH block */
433 write_register(kgd, IH_VMID_0_LUT + vmid * sizeof(uint32_t),
434 pasid_mapping);
435
436 return 0;
437}
438
439static int kgd_init_pipeline(struct kgd_dev *kgd, uint32_t pipe_id,
440 uint32_t hpd_size, uint64_t hpd_gpu_addr)
441{
442 uint32_t mec = (pipe_id / CIK_PIPE_PER_MEC) + 1;
443 uint32_t pipe = (pipe_id % CIK_PIPE_PER_MEC);
444
445 lock_srbm(kgd, mec, pipe, 0, 0);
446 write_register(kgd, CP_HPD_EOP_BASE_ADDR,
447 lower_32_bits(hpd_gpu_addr >> 8));
448 write_register(kgd, CP_HPD_EOP_BASE_ADDR_HI,
449 upper_32_bits(hpd_gpu_addr >> 8));
450 write_register(kgd, CP_HPD_EOP_VMID, 0);
451 write_register(kgd, CP_HPD_EOP_CONTROL, hpd_size);
452 unlock_srbm(kgd);
453
454 return 0;
455}
456
457static int kgd_init_interrupts(struct kgd_dev *kgd, uint32_t pipe_id)
458{
459 uint32_t mec;
460 uint32_t pipe;
461
462 mec = (pipe_id / CIK_PIPE_PER_MEC) + 1;
463 pipe = (pipe_id % CIK_PIPE_PER_MEC);
464
465 lock_srbm(kgd, mec, pipe, 0, 0);
466
467 write_register(kgd, CPC_INT_CNTL,
468 TIME_STAMP_INT_ENABLE | OPCODE_ERROR_INT_ENABLE);
469
470 unlock_srbm(kgd);
471
472 return 0;
473}
474
475static inline uint32_t get_sdma_base_addr(struct cik_sdma_rlc_registers *m)
476{
477 uint32_t retval;
478
479 retval = m->sdma_engine_id * SDMA1_REGISTER_OFFSET +
480 m->sdma_queue_id * KFD_CIK_SDMA_QUEUE_OFFSET;
481
482 pr_debug("kfd: sdma base address: 0x%x\n", retval);
483
484 return retval;
485}
486
487static inline struct cik_mqd *get_mqd(void *mqd)
488{
489 return (struct cik_mqd *)mqd;
490}
491
492static inline struct cik_sdma_rlc_registers *get_sdma_mqd(void *mqd)
493{
494 return (struct cik_sdma_rlc_registers *)mqd;
495}
496
497static int kgd_hqd_load(struct kgd_dev *kgd, void *mqd, uint32_t pipe_id,
498 uint32_t queue_id, uint32_t __user *wptr)
499{
500 uint32_t wptr_shadow, is_wptr_shadow_valid;
501 struct cik_mqd *m;
502
503 m = get_mqd(mqd);
504
505 is_wptr_shadow_valid = !get_user(wptr_shadow, wptr);
506
507 acquire_queue(kgd, pipe_id, queue_id);
508 write_register(kgd, CP_MQD_BASE_ADDR, m->cp_mqd_base_addr_lo);
509 write_register(kgd, CP_MQD_BASE_ADDR_HI, m->cp_mqd_base_addr_hi);
510 write_register(kgd, CP_MQD_CONTROL, m->cp_mqd_control);
511
512 write_register(kgd, CP_HQD_PQ_BASE, m->cp_hqd_pq_base_lo);
513 write_register(kgd, CP_HQD_PQ_BASE_HI, m->cp_hqd_pq_base_hi);
514 write_register(kgd, CP_HQD_PQ_CONTROL, m->cp_hqd_pq_control);
515
516 write_register(kgd, CP_HQD_IB_CONTROL, m->cp_hqd_ib_control);
517 write_register(kgd, CP_HQD_IB_BASE_ADDR, m->cp_hqd_ib_base_addr_lo);
518 write_register(kgd, CP_HQD_IB_BASE_ADDR_HI, m->cp_hqd_ib_base_addr_hi);
519
520 write_register(kgd, CP_HQD_IB_RPTR, m->cp_hqd_ib_rptr);
521
522 write_register(kgd, CP_HQD_PERSISTENT_STATE,
523 m->cp_hqd_persistent_state);
524 write_register(kgd, CP_HQD_SEMA_CMD, m->cp_hqd_sema_cmd);
525 write_register(kgd, CP_HQD_MSG_TYPE, m->cp_hqd_msg_type);
526
527 write_register(kgd, CP_HQD_ATOMIC0_PREOP_LO,
528 m->cp_hqd_atomic0_preop_lo);
529
530 write_register(kgd, CP_HQD_ATOMIC0_PREOP_HI,
531 m->cp_hqd_atomic0_preop_hi);
532
533 write_register(kgd, CP_HQD_ATOMIC1_PREOP_LO,
534 m->cp_hqd_atomic1_preop_lo);
535
536 write_register(kgd, CP_HQD_ATOMIC1_PREOP_HI,
537 m->cp_hqd_atomic1_preop_hi);
538
539 write_register(kgd, CP_HQD_PQ_RPTR_REPORT_ADDR,
540 m->cp_hqd_pq_rptr_report_addr_lo);
541
542 write_register(kgd, CP_HQD_PQ_RPTR_REPORT_ADDR_HI,
543 m->cp_hqd_pq_rptr_report_addr_hi);
544
545 write_register(kgd, CP_HQD_PQ_RPTR, m->cp_hqd_pq_rptr);
546
547 write_register(kgd, CP_HQD_PQ_WPTR_POLL_ADDR,
548 m->cp_hqd_pq_wptr_poll_addr_lo);
549
550 write_register(kgd, CP_HQD_PQ_WPTR_POLL_ADDR_HI,
551 m->cp_hqd_pq_wptr_poll_addr_hi);
552
553 write_register(kgd, CP_HQD_PQ_DOORBELL_CONTROL,
554 m->cp_hqd_pq_doorbell_control);
555
556 write_register(kgd, CP_HQD_VMID, m->cp_hqd_vmid);
557
558 write_register(kgd, CP_HQD_QUANTUM, m->cp_hqd_quantum);
559
560 write_register(kgd, CP_HQD_PIPE_PRIORITY, m->cp_hqd_pipe_priority);
561 write_register(kgd, CP_HQD_QUEUE_PRIORITY, m->cp_hqd_queue_priority);
562
563 write_register(kgd, CP_HQD_IQ_RPTR, m->cp_hqd_iq_rptr);
564
565 if (is_wptr_shadow_valid)
566 write_register(kgd, CP_HQD_PQ_WPTR, wptr_shadow);
567
568 write_register(kgd, CP_HQD_ACTIVE, m->cp_hqd_active);
569 release_queue(kgd);
570
571 return 0;
572}
573
574static int kgd_hqd_sdma_load(struct kgd_dev *kgd, void *mqd)
575{
576 struct cik_sdma_rlc_registers *m;
577 uint32_t sdma_base_addr;
578
579 m = get_sdma_mqd(mqd);
580 sdma_base_addr = get_sdma_base_addr(m);
581
582 write_register(kgd,
583 sdma_base_addr + SDMA0_RLC0_VIRTUAL_ADDR,
584 m->sdma_rlc_virtual_addr);
585
586 write_register(kgd,
587 sdma_base_addr + SDMA0_RLC0_RB_BASE,
588 m->sdma_rlc_rb_base);
589
590 write_register(kgd,
591 sdma_base_addr + SDMA0_RLC0_RB_BASE_HI,
592 m->sdma_rlc_rb_base_hi);
593
594 write_register(kgd,
595 sdma_base_addr + SDMA0_RLC0_RB_RPTR_ADDR_LO,
596 m->sdma_rlc_rb_rptr_addr_lo);
597
598 write_register(kgd,
599 sdma_base_addr + SDMA0_RLC0_RB_RPTR_ADDR_HI,
600 m->sdma_rlc_rb_rptr_addr_hi);
601
602 write_register(kgd,
603 sdma_base_addr + SDMA0_RLC0_DOORBELL,
604 m->sdma_rlc_doorbell);
605
606 write_register(kgd,
607 sdma_base_addr + SDMA0_RLC0_RB_CNTL,
608 m->sdma_rlc_rb_cntl);
609
610 return 0;
611}
612
613static bool kgd_hqd_is_occupied(struct kgd_dev *kgd, uint64_t queue_address,
614 uint32_t pipe_id, uint32_t queue_id)
615{
616 uint32_t act;
617 bool retval = false;
618 uint32_t low, high;
619
620 acquire_queue(kgd, pipe_id, queue_id);
621 act = read_register(kgd, CP_HQD_ACTIVE);
622 if (act) {
623 low = lower_32_bits(queue_address >> 8);
624 high = upper_32_bits(queue_address >> 8);
625
626 if (low == read_register(kgd, CP_HQD_PQ_BASE) &&
627 high == read_register(kgd, CP_HQD_PQ_BASE_HI))
628 retval = true;
629 }
630 release_queue(kgd);
631 return retval;
632}
633
634static bool kgd_hqd_sdma_is_occupied(struct kgd_dev *kgd, void *mqd)
635{
636 struct cik_sdma_rlc_registers *m;
637 uint32_t sdma_base_addr;
638 uint32_t sdma_rlc_rb_cntl;
639
640 m = get_sdma_mqd(mqd);
641 sdma_base_addr = get_sdma_base_addr(m);
642
643 sdma_rlc_rb_cntl = read_register(kgd,
644 sdma_base_addr + SDMA0_RLC0_RB_CNTL);
645
646 if (sdma_rlc_rb_cntl & SDMA_RB_ENABLE)
647 return true;
648
649 return false;
650}
651
652static int kgd_hqd_destroy(struct kgd_dev *kgd, uint32_t reset_type,
653 unsigned int timeout, uint32_t pipe_id,
654 uint32_t queue_id)
655{
656 uint32_t temp;
657
658 acquire_queue(kgd, pipe_id, queue_id);
659 write_register(kgd, CP_HQD_PQ_DOORBELL_CONTROL, 0);
660
661 write_register(kgd, CP_HQD_DEQUEUE_REQUEST, reset_type);
662
663 while (true) {
664 temp = read_register(kgd, CP_HQD_ACTIVE);
665 if (temp & 0x1)
666 break;
667 if (timeout == 0) {
668 pr_err("kfd: cp queue preemption time out (%dms)\n",
669 temp);
670 release_queue(kgd);
671 return -ETIME;
672 }
673 msleep(20);
674 timeout -= 20;
675 }
676
677 release_queue(kgd);
678 return 0;
679}
680
681static int kgd_hqd_sdma_destroy(struct kgd_dev *kgd, void *mqd,
682 unsigned int timeout)
683{
684 struct cik_sdma_rlc_registers *m;
685 uint32_t sdma_base_addr;
686 uint32_t temp;
687
688 m = get_sdma_mqd(mqd);
689 sdma_base_addr = get_sdma_base_addr(m);
690
691 temp = read_register(kgd, sdma_base_addr + SDMA0_RLC0_RB_CNTL);
692 temp = temp & ~SDMA_RB_ENABLE;
693 write_register(kgd, sdma_base_addr + SDMA0_RLC0_RB_CNTL, temp);
694
695 while (true) {
696 temp = read_register(kgd, sdma_base_addr +
697 SDMA0_RLC0_CONTEXT_STATUS);
698 if (temp & SDMA_RLC_IDLE)
699 break;
700 if (timeout == 0)
701 return -ETIME;
702 msleep(20);
703 timeout -= 20;
704 }
705
706 write_register(kgd, sdma_base_addr + SDMA0_RLC0_DOORBELL, 0);
707 write_register(kgd, sdma_base_addr + SDMA0_RLC0_RB_RPTR, 0);
708 write_register(kgd, sdma_base_addr + SDMA0_RLC0_RB_WPTR, 0);
709 write_register(kgd, sdma_base_addr + SDMA0_RLC0_RB_BASE, 0);
710
711 return 0;
712}
713
714static int kgd_address_watch_disable(struct kgd_dev *kgd)
715{
716 union TCP_WATCH_CNTL_BITS cntl;
717 unsigned int i;
718
719 cntl.u32All = 0;
720
721 cntl.bitfields.valid = 0;
722 cntl.bitfields.mask = ADDRESS_WATCH_REG_CNTL_DEFAULT_MASK;
723 cntl.bitfields.atc = 1;
724
725 /* Turning off this address until we set all the registers */
726 for (i = 0; i < MAX_WATCH_ADDRESSES; i++)
727 write_register(kgd,
728 watchRegs[i * ADDRESS_WATCH_REG_MAX +
729 ADDRESS_WATCH_REG_CNTL],
730 cntl.u32All);
731
732 return 0;
733}
734
735static int kgd_address_watch_execute(struct kgd_dev *kgd,
736 unsigned int watch_point_id,
737 uint32_t cntl_val,
738 uint32_t addr_hi,
739 uint32_t addr_lo)
740{
741 union TCP_WATCH_CNTL_BITS cntl;
742
743 cntl.u32All = cntl_val;
744
745 /* Turning off this watch point until we set all the registers */
746 cntl.bitfields.valid = 0;
747 write_register(kgd,
748 watchRegs[watch_point_id * ADDRESS_WATCH_REG_MAX +
749 ADDRESS_WATCH_REG_CNTL],
750 cntl.u32All);
751
752 write_register(kgd,
753 watchRegs[watch_point_id * ADDRESS_WATCH_REG_MAX +
754 ADDRESS_WATCH_REG_ADDR_HI],
755 addr_hi);
756
757 write_register(kgd,
758 watchRegs[watch_point_id * ADDRESS_WATCH_REG_MAX +
759 ADDRESS_WATCH_REG_ADDR_LO],
760 addr_lo);
761
762 /* Enable the watch point */
763 cntl.bitfields.valid = 1;
764
765 write_register(kgd,
766 watchRegs[watch_point_id * ADDRESS_WATCH_REG_MAX +
767 ADDRESS_WATCH_REG_CNTL],
768 cntl.u32All);
769
770 return 0;
771}
772
773static int kgd_wave_control_execute(struct kgd_dev *kgd,
774 uint32_t gfx_index_val,
775 uint32_t sq_cmd)
776{
777 struct radeon_device *rdev = get_radeon_device(kgd);
778 uint32_t data;
779
780 mutex_lock(&rdev->grbm_idx_mutex);
781
782 write_register(kgd, GRBM_GFX_INDEX, gfx_index_val);
783 write_register(kgd, SQ_CMD, sq_cmd);
784
785 /* Restore the GRBM_GFX_INDEX register */
786
787 data = INSTANCE_BROADCAST_WRITES | SH_BROADCAST_WRITES |
788 SE_BROADCAST_WRITES;
789
790 write_register(kgd, GRBM_GFX_INDEX, data);
791
792 mutex_unlock(&rdev->grbm_idx_mutex);
793
794 return 0;
795}
796
797static uint32_t kgd_address_watch_get_offset(struct kgd_dev *kgd,
798 unsigned int watch_point_id,
799 unsigned int reg_offset)
800{
801 return watchRegs[watch_point_id * ADDRESS_WATCH_REG_MAX + reg_offset];
802}
803
804static bool get_atc_vmid_pasid_mapping_valid(struct kgd_dev *kgd, uint8_t vmid)
805{
806 uint32_t reg;
807 struct radeon_device *rdev = (struct radeon_device *) kgd;
808
809 reg = RREG32(ATC_VMID0_PASID_MAPPING + vmid*4);
810 return reg & ATC_VMID_PASID_MAPPING_VALID_MASK;
811}
812
813static uint16_t get_atc_vmid_pasid_mapping_pasid(struct kgd_dev *kgd,
814 uint8_t vmid)
815{
816 uint32_t reg;
817 struct radeon_device *rdev = (struct radeon_device *) kgd;
818
819 reg = RREG32(ATC_VMID0_PASID_MAPPING + vmid*4);
820 return reg & ATC_VMID_PASID_MAPPING_PASID_MASK;
821}
822
823static void write_vmid_invalidate_request(struct kgd_dev *kgd, uint8_t vmid)
824{
825 struct radeon_device *rdev = (struct radeon_device *) kgd;
826
827 return WREG32(VM_INVALIDATE_REQUEST, 1 << vmid);
828}
829
830static uint16_t get_fw_version(struct kgd_dev *kgd, enum kgd_engine_type type)
831{
832 struct radeon_device *rdev = (struct radeon_device *) kgd;
833 const union radeon_firmware_header *hdr;
834
835 BUG_ON(kgd == NULL || rdev->mec_fw == NULL);
836
837 switch (type) {
838 case KGD_ENGINE_PFP:
839 hdr = (const union radeon_firmware_header *) rdev->pfp_fw->data;
840 break;
841
842 case KGD_ENGINE_ME:
843 hdr = (const union radeon_firmware_header *) rdev->me_fw->data;
844 break;
845
846 case KGD_ENGINE_CE:
847 hdr = (const union radeon_firmware_header *) rdev->ce_fw->data;
848 break;
849
850 case KGD_ENGINE_MEC1:
851 hdr = (const union radeon_firmware_header *) rdev->mec_fw->data;
852 break;
853
854 case KGD_ENGINE_MEC2:
855 hdr = (const union radeon_firmware_header *)
856 rdev->mec2_fw->data;
857 break;
858
859 case KGD_ENGINE_RLC:
860 hdr = (const union radeon_firmware_header *) rdev->rlc_fw->data;
861 break;
862
863 case KGD_ENGINE_SDMA1:
864 case KGD_ENGINE_SDMA2:
865 hdr = (const union radeon_firmware_header *)
866 rdev->sdma_fw->data;
867 break;
868
869 default:
870 return 0;
871 }
872
873 if (hdr == NULL)
874 return 0;
875
876 /* Only 12 bit in use*/
877 return hdr->common.ucode_version;
878}
